name: orca-patch-notes
description: Serverless application distributing patch notes for NCLS Development's Orca solution, using AWS CloudFormation

scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file app-spec.yaml --output-template-file dist/app-spec.packaged.yaml --s3-bucket orca-patch-notes
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file dist/app-spec.packaged.yaml --stack-name orca-patch-notes --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
